member.name: T:ConsoleApp1.Calculator
member.summary:
Calculator class Has methods to perform mathematical operations.
Add Addition Operation
Sub Subtraction Operation
Mul Multiplication Operation
Div Division Operation
member.remarks: This class can add, subtract, multiply and divide.

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Calculator.Add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds two integers and and returns the result as .

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Calculator.Sub(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: performs substraction on two integers and and returns the result as .

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Calculator.Mul(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: performs multiplication on two integers and and returns the result as .

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Calculator.Div(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: performs division on two integers and and returns the result as .
member.exception: Thrown when the second parameter is zero
